description:
Bensinjakt helps you find gas stations close to you when you are on the run.
All this wrapped in a beautiful easy to use interface.

There are 2 main modes in the application: 

 + Quick overview with distance for 20 of the nearest gas stations is provided at the first glance. Tap on any of them for more information about the station and a map which updates in realtime as you drive!

 + Map mode - turn your phone to landscape mode for a full screen map with the same 20 stations marked out, so you can plan your trip better.

Bensinjakt contains around 10 000 gas stations in Germany, Denmark, Norway & Sweden. More countries coming soon.

In future releases you'll be able to choose to display only your favorite gas companies, ability to set a search radius and more...

Bensinjakt - Swedish expression that roughly translates to "Gas Hunt".
